entry.title: Bitcoin Protocol Specification
entry.summary: The author of this message thanks the recipients for their words of encouragement and announces that they will upload the raw .tex files on Github shortly. The author also requests any other proposals the recipients might have, particularly regarding revisions to the signature section. The message concludes with links to additional information on network functionality that can be found on the Bitcoin wiki page, including details on client block exchange, transaction exchange, initialization and startup, node discovery, connectivity, sockets, and messages. The author signs off with warm greetings and their name, Krzysztof.
